releaseNotes:
We’ve got some exciting updates for you!
In this version:
• Sketch to Art—turn your drawings and doodles into artwork in a snap
• Pixel Art and Anime styles added to AI Video
• The Favorites section is back on the generation screen

We love getting feedback from you! Please leave your reviews so we can keep making the app even better.
description:
Want to create mesmerizing artwork? Or looking for a way to visualize your wildest ideas? 

Meet AI Arta—your personal AI art studio designed to turn your ideas into breathtaking masterpieces. Discover a world of boundless creativity:

► Turn words into AI art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Arta can show you all that and more! 

Trained with millions of pictures from the Web, this powerful AI image generator will transform your dreams into visual art in seconds! Simply type in what you have in mind, and it will generate an AI painting that matches your description.

► Reimagine your videos
Our AI video generator turns ordinary clips into mesmerizing videos that blur the lines between fantasy and reality. Explore a wide variety of templates to feel like a hero of a breathtaking magical scenario, futuristic cyberpunk world, exciting anime universe, and beyond!

► Explore art styles
AI Arta has mastered a variety of art styles and techniques: from cartoonish pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism. Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

► Create art from images
If you have an exact concept of what your AI drawing should look like, you may add an image as a visual guide for your prompt. Whether you want to refine your sketch into stunning artwork or create a custom tattoo design, our AI image generator and tattoo maker have got you covered!

► Generate avatars
With our AI photo generator, you can transform your selfies into realistic portraits in various settings, eras, and styles. Try on the roles of an epic comic-style superhero, an unstoppable cyborg from the future, a 90s rock star, and more.

► Transform photos with AI filters
Take your selfies to the next level with AI-powered filters! Craft professional profile pictures with the AI headshot generator, turn yourself into a video game character, or use our anime AI style to cartoon yourself in your photos. You can even customize your own AI filter for truly unique transformations.

► Get inspired
Get a boost of inspiration by browsing a gallery of amazing AI art generated by people all over the world. Explore the ideas of others and get your creative juices flowing!

You can enable a free trial to access the features included in the subscription.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/privacy
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/terms
